price: (6) [It is] the promise of Allāh. Allāh does not fail in His promise, but most of the people do not know.
arabic: وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ ٱللَّهُ وَعۡدَهُۥ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waʿda al-lahi lā yukh'lifu al-lahu waʿdahu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
